column4: Just a question of curiosity: How do you know it dpeneds on xutils-dev?
that's the only package that provides a binary called lndir (found with apt-file)
scroll up and read the most recent conversation between ryanakca and myself
I have no idea what any of it is! gah! don't know where to start! lol
add the option to the line "# defoptions=" as well
it's a code for a resolution. Look up the link I posted.
resist the temptation to learn everything at once ;)
the change to the # defoptions line ensures that the setting survives your  next kernel upgrade.
